summary: I DRIVE IN STOP AND GO TRAFFIC TO AND FROM WORK.  WHEN I PUSH ON GAS IT MAKES ONE KNOCK SOUND.  WHEN I LET GO IT MAKES ONE KNOCK SOUND.   IT'S ONLY ONCE, IT DOES NOT KNOCK CONTINUOUSLY.  IT STARTED MAKING THIS NOISE AFTER OIL CHANGE IN JANUARY EVERY SO OFTEN BUT IT HAS GOTTEN TO BE EVERY TIME I PUSH ON GAS AND LET GO NOW.  I WAS TOLD I NEED A TRANSMISSION FLUSH WHEN I GOT THE OIL CHANGED JUST RECENTLY IN APRIL.  COULD THIS BE THE WHAT IS CAUSING THE KNOCK NOISE?  I READ REVIEWS ON FLUSHES AND SOME SAY TO GET IT DONE , OTHERS SAY IT HAS DAMAGED THEIR CARS TRANSMISSION.
